This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] User succesfully selected an empty directory.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "AbortError: The user aborted a request."
[FAIL] User granted write access.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "AbortError: The user aborted a request."
[FAIL] Send and receive messages using a message port in a same origin window.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "AbortError: The user aborted a request."
[FAIL] Send and receive messages using a message port in a blob window.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "AbortError: The user aborted a request."
[FAIL] Send and receive messages using a message port in a sandboxed same origin window.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "AbortError: The user aborted a request."
Harness: the test ran to completion.
